channel.title: Jay M. Patel
channel.description: Recent content on Jay M. Patel

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am a fullstack software developer and an internet marketer working on web scraping, natural language processing, data mining and content marketing. I also design and implement machine learning based models at a startup Specrom Analytics as their principal data scientist. In my free time, I volunteer in dangs district in India to assist tribal community in building homes, getting clean water and sanitation. I also write about issues pertaining to these issues at various outlets as well as blog about them here.

item.title: Natural language processing (NLP): Text Vectorization and Bag of Words Approach
item.description: Let us consider a simple task of classifying a given email into spam or not spam. As you might have already guessed, this is an example of a simple binary classification problem with target or label values being 0 or 1, within the larger field of supervised machine learning (ML). However, we still need to convert non-numerical text contained in emails into numerical features which can be fed into a ML algorithm of our choice.

item.title: Top Data Science Interview Questions and Answers
item.description: Machine Learning Basics 1. What is machine learning? Machine learning (ML) is a field of computer science that gives computer systems the ability to progressively improve performance on a specific task aka learn with data without being explicitly programmed. Taking a 50,000 ft view, we want to model a given dataset either to make predictions or we want a model to describe a given dataset to gain valuable insights.

item.title: Get Started with Git and Github in Under 10 Minutes
item.description: Git is probably the most popular version control system being used right now, and if you have any experience with other version control systems like subversion than it’s strongly recommended that you go through this section since lot of concepts from other systems don’t directly translate to Git. item.title: CV
item.description: jay@jaympatel.com | jaypatel87@gmail.com LINKEDIN: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jay-m-patel-engg HOMEPAGE: http://www.jaympatel.com Click here for latest PDF version PROFILE: Data scientist with over five year’s experience in data analytics, machine learning, statistics and text mining. I have coauthored 1 book, 10 papers, 26 conference presentations and am passionate about explaining data science to non-technical business audiences. Frequent speaker at data science events hosted by Federal community of practice (CoP) as part of DigitalGov initiative.
